text: Colin William Markham (4 June 1940 â€“ 6 September 2020) was an Australian politician. He was a Labor Party member of the New South Wales Legislative Assembly from 1988 to 2003. He was a parliamentary secretary in the first two terms of the Carr Labor government. He was born in Wollongong, New South Wales. Markham died on 6 September 2020 at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from New South Wales
title: Col Markham
